snippet: The New York City Council missed an opportunity by seeking to study “member items” rather than end these stipends that pad members’ salaries.
abstract: Editorial contends arrest of New York City Councilman Ruben Wills for alleged theft of public funds is reminder about the need to put the greatest possible distance between the public trough and politician's fingers; notes that it occurred same day as Council convened its first hearing on package of rule changes meant to increase transparency and accountability.
lead_paragraph: The New York City Council missed an opportunity by seeking to study “member items” rather than end these stipends that pad members’ salaries.

headline.main: The City Council, Playing by Better Rules
